header.title: Let's build something great together
header.description: Whether your want to start from scratch or add new features to your project, I'm here to help. You can hire me as a solo dev or I can join your team for the services below.

scoping.title: Zero to one - Scopes & Prototypes
scoping.description: I help you understand your audience, map out user journeys, and outline the structure of your app. From there, I create interactive prototypes that bring your vision to life with a focus on your brand and user experience.

development.title: Hit the ground running - Build your project
development.description: Whether you're looking to build an MVP or add new features to an existing app, I specialize in building efficient and scalable solutions with Ruby on Rails. I make sure your app evolves alongside your business goals.

apis.title: Connect & Grow - APIs integrations
apis.description: Let’s expand your app’s capabilities by integrating APIs to enhance functionality. From payment processing to CRMs, I seamlessly connect your app to the services you need.

deploy.title: Ready to shine - Tests, deploy & collaboration
deploy.description: With a focus on quality and reliability, I handle testing and deployment to ensure smooth launches. I’m ready to collaborate with your team, maintain code quality, and keep your project moving forward.

boost.title: Conquer the market - Boost & track traffic
boost.description: Let’s bring new users to your app and keep them engaged! Using my experience in Marketing, I help you set up tools to monitor traffic and implement strategies for growth.
